body.p: To connect BUSMASTER to the LIN Network first it has to be configured with the proper LIN Baud Rate and LIN Protocol Version.This can be done using by importing a LDF or using manual settings
To configure the Cluster use LIN->Cluster Configuration menu.This will display the Window as shown in following Figure.
LIN Buad Rate & Protocol version can be set either by Loading the LDF File or using LIN Network Settings section by Enabling Overwrite LDF Settings as shown in above figure.
